page.title: 10Gt.Ayton:Arts,Crafts&Gardens
page.content: A Mrs. Wilson writes books and radio plays.She is blind but dictates to her husband who does the actual writing. A Dr.Plummer works with silver ,making ornaments. Mrs. 'Joni' Essex prints pamphlets, booklets, and illustrations. There are many people who paint and draw, and a weekly art class is held in winter.At least one lady still weaves in her cottage. Most houses in the villag have at least one small garden, and some are large.There is considerable interest in the subject and their attractive flowers enhance the appearance of the village.
